CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Since the open - circuit voltage V oc of bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) PSCs is positively correlated to the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and the HOMO energy level of the donor polymer , a higher V oc for PzNDTDTBObased polymer solar cells could be anticipated due to the lowerlying HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PzNDTDTBO - This is the name of the donor polymer.
2. BHJ - This is the name of the bulk heterojunction (BHJ) polymer solar cells.
3. LUMO - This stands for "Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital" and refers to the energy level of the acceptor polymer.
4. HOMO - This stands for "Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital" and refers to the energy level of the donor polymer.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph after removing the irrelevant ones:

1. PzNDTDTBO - This is the name of the donor polymer.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBO |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Since the open - circuit voltage V oc of bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) PSCs is positively correlated to the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and the HOMO energy level of the donor polymer , a higher V oc for PzNDTDTBObased polymer solar cells could be anticipated due to the lowerlying HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. V oc - Open-circuit voltage
2. LUMO - Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital
3. HOMO - Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital
4. PzNDTDTBO - A specific polymer (the donor polymer)

Note that these are chemical properties or concepts, rather than physical properties of the entities mentioned.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. V oc - Open-circuit voltage
2. HOMO - Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital
3. LUMO - Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital

These are the material properties of the polymers being discussed in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| V oc |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Since the open - circuit voltage V oc of bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) PSCs is positively correlated to the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and the HOMO energy level of the donor polymer , a higher V oc for PzNDTDTBObased polymer solar cells could be anticipated due to the lowerlying HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO.

Let's think step by step.

In this paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Open-circuit voltage (Voc): This is a property of the bulk heterojunction (BHJ) polymer solar cells, which is positively correlated with the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and the HOMO energy level of the donor polymer.
2. Open-circuit voltage (Voc) of PzNDTDTBObased polymer solar cells: This is a specific value of the open-circuit voltage for the PzNDTDTBO-based polymer solar cells, which is expected to be higher due to the lower HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO.

Therefore, the two "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. Voc
2. Voc of PzNDTDTBObased polymer solar cells
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph:

1. Open-circuit voltage (Voc): This is a property of the bulk heterojunction (BHJ) polymer solar cells, which is positively correlated with the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and the HOMO energy level of the donor polymer.
2. Voc of PzNDTDTBObased polymer solar cells: This is a specific value of the open-circuit voltage for the PzNDTDTBO-based polymer solar cells, which is expected to be higher due to the lower HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO.

Therefore, the two entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are:

1. Voc
2. Voc of PzNDTDTBObased polymer solar cells

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Open-circuit voltage (Voc) |
| Voc of PzNDTDTBObased polymer solar cells |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
